text: Positive vaccine news to start the week: The first single-dose COVID-19 vaccine has been authorized for use in the United States. Advisors for the @CDCgov unanimously voted to recommend the @JNJNews shots for Americans 18 and older. #vaccine #COVID19 https://t.co/H63s4lbjD6 https://t.co/vOmh4bxGWF
